message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and exceptional quality, it stands out as a top choice in its category. I believe it could significantly enhance your experience. For this exceptional value, I am offering it to you for $100. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations and budget.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm looking to save a bit of money, but I'm still willing to pay a fair price for the quality you're offering. Can you meet me at $80?
